author: John Paul Tasker
title: Government documents reveal a slow start to Canada's COVID-19 response
description: Briefing notes prepared by bureaucrats for federal ministers show just how quickly the COVID-19 situation evolved in Canada — with public health officials stating the risk of transmission in Canada was low right up until early March, only to recommend an orde…
